title.value: Анализ эффективности производства продукции свиноводства в Гродненской области [Беларусь]
The analysis of a production efficiency of swine breeding products in the Grodno region [Belarus]
The analysis of a production efficiency of swine breeding products in the Grodno region [Belarus]

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Rudenko, D.V., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the article the modern condition of pork products production in the Grodno region is analyzed. The developed tendencies of manufacture of pork for last 5 years are considered. On the basis of the lead analysis it is possible to draw a conclusion, that the Grodno area is characterized, high parameters of swine breeding development level and economic efficiency. The increase in a mid-annual livestock of pigs, including on cultivation and fattening, increase of a daily average gain of their alive weight is observed. It promotes increase in a total gain of alive weight and products of pigs cultivation. Quality indicators of development of branch are analyzed. Increase of a daily average gain of alive weight is accompanied by reduction in labor input and the charge of forages on 1 center of cultivation production, increase of average weight of 1 head of the pigs realized on meat, increase in profit on realization of pigs in all directions and increase of pork profitability level. Examples of actions for pork products manufacture increase production are resulted.
